name: Ballistic Piers
description:
Sujan @BurningSushi, Denise @DeniseJorudano and Geraldo @Solivagant made Ballistic Piers, a procedurally generated speedfast paced game for the Game Jam held during Develop Conf 2014, organized by @nashimir.

Awarded "Honorable Mention for getting the most woos out of the audience" by a panel of experienced game devs.

Press Space to start playing, use A and D to dodge the piers!
